title: Data Artifact Registry Schema (v94.1 Refactor)
description: Defines and registers all fundamental data artifacts, specifying type, source, governance constraints, and freshness requirements.

registry_version.description: Semantic version of the artifact definitions.

artifacts.description: Map of data artifact definitions, keyed by their unique identifier (source_data_key).

data_type.description: The fundamental primitive or structured type of the artifact.

source_system.description: The agent, system, or process that generates or provides the artifact.

sensitivity_level.description: Classification of the data artifact for governance, access control, and logging policies.

freshness_ttl_hours.description: Time-to-live for data validity, in hours. Nullable if data is static.

unit_of_measure.description: The specific unit for quantitative data (e.g., 'USD', 'milliseconds', 'count', 'percent', 'ratio').
